sources.title: The Phantom Empire (1935) GENE AUTRYüçï12-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
12-CHAPTER SERIAL MARATHON!
Starring: Gene Autry, Frankie Darro, Betsy King Ross
Directors: Otto Brower & B. Reeves Eason
THE FIRST SCIENCE FICTION WESTERN
Singing cowboy Gene Autry stumbles upon an ancient subterranean civilization living beneath his ranch that becomes corrupted by unscrupulous, greedy speculators from the surface!
  üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Cliffhanger Introduction
01:08     CHAPTER 1:  The Singing Cowboy
32:20     CHAPTER 2:  The Thunder Riders
52:13     CHAPTER 3:  The Lightning Chamber
1:12:08  CHAPTER 4:  Phantom Broadcast
1:29:57  CHAPTER 5:  Beneath the Earth
1:50:17  CHAPTER 6:  Disaster from the Skies
2:07:54  CHAPTER 7:  From Death to Life
2:27:26  CHAPTER 8:  Jaws of Jeopardy
2:47:17  CHAPTER 9:  Prisoners of the Ray
3:05:05  CHAPTER 10: The Rebellion
3:24:12  CHAPTER 11: A Queen in Chains
3:42:41  CHAPTER 12: The End of Murania
4:01:05  Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: When the ancient continent of Mu sank beneath the ocean, some of its inhabitant survived in caverns beneath the sea. Cowboy singer Gene Autry stumbles upon the civilization, now buried beneath his own Radio Ranch. The Muranians have developed technology and weaponry such as television and ray guns. Their rich supply of radium draws unscrupulous speculators from the surface. The peaceful civilization of the Muranians is corrupted by the greed from above, and it becomes Autry's task to prevent all-out war, ideally without disrupting his regular radio show.
metadata.Writer: Wallace MacDonald, Gerald Geraghty, Hy Freedman
metadata.Actors: Gene Autry, Frankie Darro, Betsy King Ross
